Brigade altamont is a very good society , this comes with all basic and modern amenities. It is having class 1 construction and amenities under brigade builders. 

The property sits on hennur main road, in the fast developing north bangalore area. Which has not only emerged as an economic hub but also as a front- Runner among self-Contained suburbs that are great places to live and work. The presence of good schools, colleges , markets, hospitals, malls, banks, atms, auto stands, bus stands,hotels, and restaurants in the area and easy access to the airport enhance its desirability. It is a main road facing project with close accessibility to all day to day needs and requirements at a stone's throwaway. It has all basic and modern amenities in it . The flat is like an individual dream of owning a quality home in a simple trouble free speedy and joyfull area.It is just at a walkable distance from bus stands auto stands. The flat is also close to markets where you would get all the things which is used in day to day life...

Title: 3 BHK Residential Apartment for rent in Devanahalli Int. Airport
Description:
No brokerage!!

We offer this 3 bhk luxury apartment as a part of the reputed range of gated housing unit. East facing and on the 7th floor it provides good balcony views with ample lighting. Semi furnished with plush kitchen interiors and the bathroom sanitary fittings from grohe' with 1 bathtub gives a luxurious and relaxing feeling. The tiles are porcelain in the common areas and the bedrooms have wooden floors for extra feel and comfort. All bathrooms comes with an external 25l water geyser.

The 2 balconies spread across the living room and bedroom 1. And another is shared between the bedroom 2 and the master bedroom. This gives a larger access to the rooms with a sense of inclusiveness. 

The kitchen is modular type with a chimney attached. An elica over the top 4 gas burner is provided. Further in the kitchen is an utility area for the washing machine and dish washer etc. There is a maids room behind the kitchen utility area with a separate attached toilet. 

A unique acrylic paint on the wall in the dining portion of the house gives a very calming effect.

The property is ideal for the family who want peace and quiet away from the usual city noise, traffic. 1 km away from the upcoming locations of the airport. With many amenities available and large spacious spread. 

Sizes (In foot):
Hall - 12*26
Dining - 12*8
Kitchen - 16*9
Bedroom 1 - 10.5*13.5
Bedroom 2 - 11*13.5
Master bedroom - 11*16.5

Description:

Expected rent is rs.25,000, slightly negotiable plus maintenance of rs. 3000 and the deposit is 1.5 lakhs , slightly negotiable. Slv paramount is a very good society , this comes with all basic amenities. It is having class 1 construction and amenities .

The property sits on hennur main road, in the fast developing north bangalore area. Which has not only emerged as an economic hub but also as a front- Runner among self-Contained suburbs that are great places to live and work. The presence of good schools, colleges , markets, hospitals, malls, banks, atms, auto stands, bus stands,hotels, and restaurants in the area and easy access to the airport enhance its desirability. Title: 3 BHK Residential Apartment for rent in Yelahanka
Description:
This 3-Bedroom flat placed on the 3rd floor of a stunning high-Rise building of rmz galleria, yelahanka, bangalore is an ultimate choice if you have been hunting for a perfect accommodation for your family. What makes this flat worth renting is the handpicked pool of modern amenities & facilities provided by the society.

Property specifications.
Encircled within the fresh & atmosphere, this 3bhk flat invites you to a brand new world of blissful living. So, come and experience the joy of living a luxurious life in this 3bhk flat situated in rmz galleria, yelahanka, bangalore. Vaastu compliance is yet another prime factor which make this flat worth living.

The flat offers 1875 sqft of living spaces and features three bright & airy bedrooms, tastefully furnished with stylish wardrobes. All the three en suite bathrooms adjoin the bedrooms are elegantly designed with western toilets. Additionally, the master bathroom is luxuriant with a shower cubicle. You can find geysers in all the three bathrooms.

Offering panoramic views of the beautiful city, the balcony attached to the hall is a perfect place to sit and relax. A beautiful chandelier in the living room is the centre of attraction of this flat. The living room is also decorated with a trendy tv unit.

Modular kitchen outfitted with cabinets and chimney has been crafted magnificently, thus creating a cheerful & joyful cooking place. An additional servant room with attached bathroom is also available to accommodate your domestic staff. This pristine 3-Bedroom flat exudes impeccable craftsmanship throughout and shines bright with stunning vitrified tiled flooring.

Facilities.
Decked with amenities like cycling & jogging track, activity deck4, event space & amphitheatre, indoor games room, outdoor tennis courts, indoor squash & badminton courts, club house, gymnasium, swimming pool, jogging and strolling track and meditation area, rmz galleria is royal retreat for sports enthusiasts.

The society is also self-Sufficient with a kids play area, kids club, visitor parking, early learning centre, reserved parking, park, library and business centre, aerobics room, kids play pool with water slides, bar/lounge, cafeteria, food court, retail boulevard (Retail shops), barbeque pit, coffee lounge & restaurants.

Facilities provided include maintenance staff, waste disposal, water storage, lift, power back up, rain water harvesting, laundry service, 24hour water supply and 24hour security. You will also be provided 1covered car parking space.

Locality.
Yelhanka is prime residential locality serviced with good transport facilities. Yelhanka railway station is just 2.5kms from this residence. Few schools & hospitals found within 5kms include vibgyor high, cambridge public school, columbia asia hospital and aster cmi hospital. There are numerous shopping malls, supermarkets, banks/atms in and around this area

Title: 3 BHK Residential Apartment for rent in jalahalli metro station
Description: Vaishnavi gardenia is an upscale residential community nestled amidst swathes of greenery and natural landscapes. Unique in its design and contemporary in its finish, the project is home to 628 sublime 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments strung together to give you the best of urban living. Each of the apartments have distinctive designs and are all located amidst some of the finest natural beauty.Vaishnavi gardenia was awarded "the most admired upcoming project" at the 2nd estrade awards(2016) in singapore. Triumphing over 200 contending projects, gardenia has established its credentials as amongst the best upcoming residential projects in bangalore.The unmistakable contours of gardenia that descend from east to west and north to south are perfectly blended into floor levels with balconies. This lends a very distinct look to the entire structure and brings uniqueness to the overall landscape. Uniqueness of the designs is not just limited to the overall structure but percolates downwards into amphitheatre, mini golf, beach volleyball, outdoor gym and other areas to keep the look consistent and free-Flowing. Wide open spaces accentuate the overall ergonomics whereas the intelligent use of space allow for more facilities to be packed-In.Further accentuating the environmental friendly theme of the project, vaishnavi gardenia has adopted extensive recycling facilities to re-Use waste in an ecologically friendly manner.

Title: 4 Bedroom Independent House for rent in Kannamangala
Description:
Adarsh serenity is made up of homes that offer sanctuary, peace and quiet in the thriving hub of whitefield. Situated in kannamangala, it features 179 luxury villas spread over 25 acres of lush space, offering an elegant and relaxed lifestyle, away from the hustle and bustle of city life.

Structure
Solid cement block masonry of 8" thick for load bearing walls and 4" thick masonry for all other walls
Plastering and external finish
Smooth plaster finish for all internal wallsexternal finishing with tyrolean/equivalent finishsloping roof covered with mangalore tiles and apartment roof with pressed clay tiles
Flooring
Imported marble in living and dining area. Polished vitrified tiles for all rooms, family, lounge and kitchen area
Pressed clay tiles for sit-Outs and terrace areas, ceramic tiles for covered sit-Outs, balconies, toilets, utility and room for domestic help
Toilets
Ceramic glazed tiles dado upto 7 ft. Height with one row of border tilespastel colour/white ewc and washbasin with granite/marble countertops and mirror for all bathrooms except the toilet for domestic helpsingle lever diverter for all showers and single lever mixer for all washbasins, except the toilet for domestic helphealth faucet in all toilets except the one for domestic help
Doors
All door frames with good quality teakdesigner shuttersbrass hardware with night latch and magic eye
Windows
Teak wood windows and ms grill work
Kitchen
Granite platform with stainless steel sink and drain boarddado above platform area with ceramic glazed tiles
Painting/polishing
Interior: Plastic emulsion paintexterior: External emulsion paint (In case of tyrolean finish)enamel painting for ms grill
Electrical
Sufficient number of electrical/tv telephone points in all villasgood quality electrical wires and switchesearth leakage circuit breakers (Elcbs) for each villaminiature circuit breaker (Mcb) provided at the main distribution box
Provision for connection of solar heater system for all villas (With necessary electrical point for the built in geyser) in all toilets except the one for domestic help

Title: 3 BHK Residential Apartment for rent in Bannerghatta Road
Description:
3 bhk/2toilet 1200 sft semi furnished flat 
The apartment is located in a prime residential locality and is just a 10 mins walk from bilkehalli singal in bannerghatta road. 
Location :
1) 1 km from accenture bang2 5 mins drive, 4 km from accenture bang3 - 20 mins drive
2) 0.6 km from bannerghatta road, apollo and fortis hospital
3) small grocery store just outside the apartment, its a huge help for some urgent common needs
4) multiple shops, supermarkets, kanti sweet house, banks, atm and necessities within 200 to 500 meters range
5) 0.5 km from presidency school, bus pickup from apartment gate and its the last pickup for school
6) next to akshara eye hospital
7) very well connected and easy access to autos, taxis and city bus service. No hassle by auto guys for drop-Off/pick due to excellant location.
8) this is a corner flat with lots of privacy and one side is open with no construction.


Features of the flat : 
1) 3 bedrooms and 2 toilets (Master bedroom western and common one is indian style)
2) large covered corner car parking (Can accommodate any suv) 
3) separate living and dining space
4) beautiful wooden template and built in study table with stoage in  
5) modular kitchen with chimney, integrated hob and dual sink
6) excellent interiors with embedded lights etc. 
7) dedicated space for washing machine in utility balcony with covered sheet.
8) 2 balconies. 
9) 24 hr gen backup for uninterrupted power supply. 
10) high end wood work done in all the three bedrooms. 
11) ample overhead storage in all three bedrooms. 
12) integrated dressing table and full length mirrors in 2 bedrooms. 
13) all bedrooms spacious enough to accommodate king size bed with standard bed-Side tables on both sides 
14) ready internet/cable connection from airtel, local service provder
15) all necessary electrical fittings - Fans, geysers, tubes etc, included

Features of the apartment complex :
1) just 24 flats covering 4 floors
2) small child play area in the basement
3) party hall with chairs in the basement
4) 24 hrs water supply by virtue of kaveri and borewell (No tanker water)
5) 24 hrs power backup (Covers all points except heating points)
6) lift
7) 24 hr security
8) domestic help/cooks are available in the building to start instantly to help you with household chores.

Title: 3 BHK Residential Apartment for rent in Devanahalli Int. Airport
Description:
No brokerage!!

We offer this 3 bhk luxury apartment as a part of the reputed range of gated housing unit. East facing and on the 3rd floor it provides good balcony views with ample lighting. Semi furnished with plush kitchen interiors and the bathroom sanitary fittings from grohe' with 1 bathtub gives a luxurious and relaxing feeling. The tiles are porcelain in the common areas and the bedrooms have wooden floors for extra feel and comfort. All bathrooms comes with an external 25l water geyser.

The 2 balconies spread across the living room and bedroom 1. And another is shared between the bedroom 2 and the master bedroom. This gives a larger access to the rooms with a sense of inclusiveness. 

The kitchen is modular type with a chimney attached. An elica over the top 4 gas burner is provided. Further in the kitchen is an utility area for the washing machine and dish washer etc. There is a maids room behind the kitchen utility area with a separate attached toilet. 

A unique acrylic paint on the wall in the dining portion of the house gives a very calming effect.

The property is ideal for the family who want peace and quiet away from the usual city noise, traffic. 1 km away from the upcoming locations of the airport. With many amenities available and large spacious spread. 

Sizes (In foot):
Hall - 12*26
Dining - 12*8
Kitchen - 16*9
Bedroom 1 - 10.5*13.5
Bedroom 2 - 11*13.5
Master bedroom - 11*16.5

Title: 4 BHK Independent Builder Floor for rent in HSR Layout
Description:
A rare opportunity to rent aesthetically designed independent villa in shubh enclave, hsr layout, bangalore south, bangalore which ensures a relaxed and comfortable stay. Being an independent villa it provides you a serene and tranquil environment with a modern setup. The villa is well-Lit with natural light and provides good ventilation.

Basic details:

The villa is constructed on a built up area of 6000 sq. Ft. And features four bedrooms, four bathrooms, two balconies, modular kitchen and a servant room. The entire villa is beautifully landscaped with garden. 

Furnishings and amenities:

The villa is a semi-Furnished unit which provides you with the liberty to furnish it as per your own needs. It consists of wardrobes, acs, chimney, microwave, one bed in master bedroom, provision for ro water filter in both dry and wet kitchens available for drinking water (Ro filter can be fitted on request) and comes with basic facilities like lights, fans and bathroom fixtures. The property has 100% teak doors and windows, is adorned with full italian marble flooring, false ceiling and wood ceiling with led lighting, one bedroom is fitted with king size bed and has excellent woodwork (Everything done except loose furniture).

It has 24*7 water facility, full power back up (Invertor and generator), ro and two covered parking. The other facilities include water storage, park, lift and waste disposal. Common amenities include bore well, automatic control system of pumping, pressure pump supply for full house, water softeners, watchman room and genset for lighting, lift and pump (Does not support acs and geysers).

There is also full power back pp, lift, park, 1000 sq. Ft. Party hall on the terrace, separate solar water heater for bath and kitchen, dry kitchen fitted with built in microwave and oven. All 4 bedrooms and dining and media room (Home theatre) are fitted with acs. There is a common 24 hr security posted at gate to guard the four dwellings in the building.

The property has a large utility area with separate entry for servants and provisions for washing machine, dish washer and drier. The servant room has an attached toilet.

Location:

The property is located in shubh enclave, hsr layout and is close to all basic amenities. The prime location provides the residents with access to the very best. The villa is located in a safe neighborhood. Moreover, the property has great connectivity with other parts of the city.

Avail the offer, your dream house is just a call away.
For more information, kindly contact the owner.

Title: 3 BHK Residential Apartment for rent in Konanakunte
Description:
When you make prestige falcon city your home, you will be living in of one of the best developments in south bangalore. This state-Of-The-Art compendium of high-Rise towers comprises a conglomeration of 2,520 world-Class apartments. Added to that is a massive retail area and the largest forum mall in bangalore, all conceptualised by prestige. Home to a sprawling clubhouse, an entertainment zone & a huge cultural & convention centre; Every feature is benchmarked with the global best, to offer a life that is rarely obtainable elsewhere. Explore this micro-Site to find out everything you wanted to know about this new prestige project on kanakapura road and discover more about a home thats been drawn from your mind. Also, make sure you submit your details in the express interest form of this page, so that one of our executives could get in touch with you.




Specifications - Prestige falcon city
General

Structure

Rcc framed structure with rcc shear wall.
Cement blocks for all walls wherever needed.


Lift
Passenger and service lifts of suitable capacity in every block.


Flooring
Vitrified / ceramic tiles in the foyer, living, dining, corridors and all bedrooms.
Anti skid ceramic tiles in balconies.

 

Kitchen
Ceramic / vitrified tiled flooring
Ceramic tile dado for 2 feet over a granite counter.
Chrome plated tap with single bowl single drain steel sink.
Ceramic / vitrified tile flooring and ceramic dado in the utility.


Toilets
Anti skid ceramic tiles for flooring with ceramic tile on walls upto false ceiling.
Granite counter with ceramic wash basin in the master toilet.
Pedestal wash basins in the other toilets
Ewcs and chrome plated fittings
Chrome plated tap with shower mixer.
Geysers in all toilets except the maids toilets.
Suspended pipelines in toilets concealed within the grid false ceiling.

 

Internal doors
Main door  8 feet high opening with pre moulded flush shutter and frame in wood, polished on both sides.
Other internal doors- 7 feet with wooden frames and flush shutters


External doors and windows
Aluminum/ upvc frames and sliding / openable shutters for all external doors.
3 track aluminum/ upvc framed shutters with clear glass and provision for mosquito mesh shutters.
Ms designer grill, enamel painted, for ground floor apartments only.


Electrical
All electrical wiring is concealed and uses pvc isolated copper wires with modular switches.
Sufficient power outlets and light points provided for
4 kw power will be provided for 2 & 2.5 bed units
6.4 kw power will be provided for 3 bed units
8 kw power will be provided for 4 bed units
Tv and telephone points provided in the living area and all bedrooms
Split ac provision in living area and in all bedrooms
Elcb and individual meters will be provided for all apartments.


Dg power
Generator will be provided for all common services, 100% backup power will be provided for all apartments at extra cost.


Lobby
Elegant ground floor lobby flooring and cladding in granite/marble.
Upper floors lobby flooring in vitrified tiles and lift cladding in marble/granite.
All lobby walls in texture paint and ceilings in obd
Service staircase and service lobby in kota with texture paint in walls.

 

Maids room
Vitrified / ceramic tile flooring and dado in the maids room and toilet.


Painting
Texture paint / cement paint on external walls
Distemper on internal walls and ceilings
Enamel paint on all railings.

 

Security system
Cctv coverage security cabins at all entry / exits.

Title: 3 Bedroom Independent House for rent in Channasandra
Description:
This villa with a 3,750 sft built-Up area is a duplex built on a 4,800sft land in a gated community called prestige glenmorgan in whitefield. With a beautiful patch of garden with assorted plants and a lawn, it has a parking area that can accommodate 2 cars easily. The ground floor has a covered verandah overlooking the garden. 
The main door is a beautifully carved teak wood polished door. It opens to a foyer and a living room 24 feet x 16 feet. A dining room large enough for an 8 seater dining table takes one to a puja room, the master bedroom (16 feet x 16 feet with an attached bathroom) and a kitchen. The kitchen is also 16 feet x 16 feet with a built-In kitchen cabinet and island. 
The first floor has 2 large bedrooms 16 feet x 21 feet, walk-In wardrobes that lead to their respective attached bathrooms. The first floor also has a large-Sized meditation/entertainment room opening to a balcony. 
All the bedrooms have a 7 feet x 6.5 feet cot.
There is a terrace which houses a servant room and a solar water heater. The gated community is well maintained by the association.
